get_lineage_key¶

outbreak_clustering.get_lineage_key(tree, field='name')¶

Create a mapping of names to tree nodes.

Parameters

  • tree -- The root of the phylo tree object (a frozendict).

  • name -- The field to map on.

Returns

An OrderedDict containing the map.
